long_description: The 4M Tin Can Robot turns the simple act of recycling a can into a mad scientist's adventure! Add motors, gears and legs to a soda can and watch it come alive. Comes with a set of plastic mechanical body parts, motor with electric wires, 1 pair of moving eyes, screws and detailed instructions. Requires an empty soda can (not included) and 2 AAA batteries (sold separately).
short_description: The 4M Tin Can Robot turns the simple act of recycling a can into a mad scientist's adventure! Add motors, gears and legs to a soda can and watch it come alive.
